bibl.title: The History of the Peoples of the Eastern Desert

bibl.seg: Tim Power, ""You Shall Not See the Tribes of the Blemmyes or of the Saracens"": On the Other 'Barbarians' of the Late Roman Eastern Desert of Egypt.

Hans Barnard & Kim Duistermaat (edd.), The History of the Peoples of the Eastern Desert = University of California. Cotsen Institute of Archaeology. Monograph 73 (Los Angeles, 2012) pp. 282-297, 7 figg.
